rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="Discovery Assessment" and approval.status in $L.file="approved" or current.phase in $L.file="Discovery Verification"
rule.conditionDesc: (( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Discovery Assessment" AND approval.status in CurrentRecord = "approved") OR current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Discovery Verification")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Discovery Assessment</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Approval Status">approval.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">approved</Value></condition></collection><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Discovery Verification</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Call the "chm.dmeUpdate" process. (when (( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Discovery Assessment" AND approval.status in CurrentRecord = "approved") OR current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Discovery Verification"))
